TEXT.TITLE: MOBIL <MOB> UNIT NAMES GROUP PRESIDENT
TEXT.BODY: Montomgery Ward and Co, a subsidiary of Mobil Corp, said it named John Weil as president of its Apparel Group, replacing Richard Bourret, who has resigned. It said Weil has been a consultant to the company since 1986. Reuter
